snippet.title: Pokemon RE: CALL - Rom Hack Gameplay Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Thanks For Watching My Pokemon RE: CALL Gameplay Walkthrough!!!

Join Membership: https://bit.ly/3OvIljh

Don't Forget to Follow!!!
Twitter: https://x.com/Scout6456?t=Pox89XiG9u8rDh3QAxCsVQ&s=09
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scou_t6456?igsh=MWplbW9mZHpkY3BnMg
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@scout6456?_t=8miun8wJrrU&_r=1
Threads: https://www.threads.net/@scou_t6456

Download Pokemon RE: CALL
https://www.mediafire.com/file/3f9syva0kznr8pq/Pokemon+RE-+CALL+(v0.1.1).gba/file

Watch More Pokemon RE: CALL https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTT0mHXKDoGYfe15JZYsxw9KIsYdp52ng&si=tCklh_0Y-b1ETe8i

Thanks to @AStartGaming for showcasing the game

INFORMATION 
Name: POKEMON RE:Call GBA
Language: English
Version: 0.0.1
Rom Based: Fire Red
Type: Rom Hack
Creator: sylingga
Updated: August 3, 2024

After become King of The Pirate Pokemon Trainer, you come back to Knot Island to meet your old friend, Bill. As a good friend, you help Bill with his mission, and encounter many problem with evil team, TEAM ROCKET. Their boss, Giovanni has hidden intentions with Pokemon, especially unique Pokemon, PARADOX POKEMON, that has energy about the past and future.

FEATURES 
- Battle Engine Upgraded to Gen 8
- All Moves, Abilities, Items, Item Effects through Gen 8
- A complete set of move animations
- Vastly improved AI system with decision-making skills for all new battle effects
- Z Moves
- Mega Evolution / Primal Reversion / Ultra Burst
- Ability pop-ups
- Hidden Abilities
- Expanded Poké Balls
- Trainers with EVs
- Class-based Music
- Class-based Poké Balls
- Dynamic Trainer Backsprites
- Pre-battle mugshots
- Wild double battles
- New Evolution Methods
- Expanded Learnsets
- Badge-based obedience
- Shiny Charm + Oval Charm
- Level Scaling
- Inverse Battles, Sky Battles
- Overworld trainer facing
- Move types light up on move menu based on effectiveness
- Expanded PC Boxes (up to 25!)
- Expanded Move Reminder (up to 50 moves)
- Improved Tm/Hm Expansion, Reusable TMs
- Updated Pickup mechanics
- Roaming Pokémon
- JPANs engine features ported and redesigned/improved in many ways
- Character Customization
- Lots of new scripting specials
- Whiteout hack / text updates
- Save-block expansion
- Dynamic overworld palettes
- Expanded Text Names (Abilities, etc)
- Select Pokemon from PC directly
- Scrolling summary screen
- Base stats on pokedex summary screen
- Updated repel system
- Expanded Pokemon in the Hall of Fame
- Expanded Text Buffers
- Footstep noise in grass & on sand
- Omnidirectional Jumping
- Move Items on Party Screen
- Expanded Coins, Safari Balls/Steps
- Fairy Type
- Oval Charm
- And More!

PROGRESS 
- Story : 20% (similar with FR)
- Sprite : 50% (Updating OW Sprite, costume, etc)
- Maps : 50% (Adding Region)
- Scripts : 20% (similar with FR)

SOURCE: https://www.pokecommunity.com/threads/pokemon-re-call-up-to-gen-9-with-hubol-engine.530778

HASHTAGS 
#pokemonre:call #pokemonromhack #pokemonfangame #pokemon #romhack #fangame #gameplay #walkthrough #playthrough #gba #scout6456
